title: Diseases of the digestive system
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period; certain infectious and parasitic diseases; complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; neoplasms; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified

title: Diseases of the skin and subcutaneous tissue
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period; certain infectious and parasitic diseases; complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; lipomelanotic reticulosis; neoplasms; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified; systemic connective tissue disorders

title: Diseases of the genitourinary system
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period; certain infectious and parasitic diseases; complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; neoplasms; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified

title: Diseases of the musculoskeletal system and connective tissue
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period; certain disorders of the temporomandibular joint; certain infectious and parasitic diseases; compartment syndrome; complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; neoplasms; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified

title: Pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium
exclusion: Certain diseases or injuries complicating pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium classified elsewhere: external causes (for mortality); Certain diseases or injuries complicating pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium classified elsewhere: injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external cause; Certain diseases or injuries complicating pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium classified elsewhere: mental and behavioural disorders associated with the puerperium; Certain diseases or injuries complicating pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium classified elsewhere: obstetrical tetanus; Certain diseases or injuries complicating pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium classified elsewhere: postpartum necrosis of pituitary gland; Certain diseases or injuries complicating pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium classified elsewhere: puerperal osteomalacia; supervision of: high-risk pregnancy; supervision of: normal pregnancy

title: Diseases of the blood and blood-forming organs and certain disorders involving the immune mechanism
exclusion: autoimmune disease (systemic) NOS; certain conditions originating in the perinatal period; complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; human immunodeficiency virus [HIV] disease; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; neoplasms; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified

title: Neoplasms
exclusion: None

title: Mental and behavioural disorders
exclusion: symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified

title: Certain infectious and parasitic diseases
inclusion: diseases generally recognized as communicable or transmissible
exclusion: carrier or suspected carrier of infectious disease; certain localized infections - see body system-related chapters; infectious and parasitic diseases complicating pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium [except obstetrical tetanus]; infectious and parasitic diseases specific to the perinatal period [except tetanus neonatorum, congenital syphilis, perinatal gonococcal infection and perinatal human immunodeficiency virus [HIV] disease]; influenza and other acute respiratory infections

title: Endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases
exclusion: complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified; transitory endocrine and metabolic disorders specific to fetus and newborn

title: Codes for special purposes
exclusion: None

title: Diseases of the nervous system
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period; certain infectious and parasitic diseases; complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; neoplasms; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified

title: Diseases of the ear and mastoid process
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period; certain infectious and parasitic diseases; complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; neoplasms; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified

title: Diseases of the eye and adnexa
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period; certain infectious and parasitic diseases; complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; neoplasms; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified

title: Diseases of the respiratory system
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period; certain infectious and parasitic diseases; complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; neoplasms; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified

title: Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified
exclusion: abnormal findings on antenatal screening of mother; certain conditions originating in the perinatal period

title: Congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
exclusion: inborn errors of metabolism

title: Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
inclusion: conditions that have their origin in the perinatal period even though death or morbidity occurs later
exclusion: congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; neoplasms; tetanus neonatorum

title: External causes of morbidity and mortality
exclusion: None

title: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
exclusion: birth trauma; obstetric trauma; malunion of fracture; nonunion of fracture [pseudarthrosis]; pathological fracture; pathological fracture with osteoporosis; stress fracture

title: Factors influencing health status and contact with health services
exclusion: None

title: Diseases of the circulatory system
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period; certain infectious and parasitic diseases; complications of pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium; congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities; endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases; injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes; neoplasms; symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified; systemic connective tissue disorders; transient cerebral ischaemic attacks and related syndromes
